paragraphs.text:
%spark2.pyspark

import pandas as pd
from pyspark.sql import HiveContext
hive_context = HiveContext(sc)
train_data = hive_context.table("ambari_test.mercari_train")
train_data.show()

paragraphs.text:
%spark2.pyspark
from pyspark.sql.functions import col
header = train_data.first()
train_data_new = train_data.where(col("train_id").isin("train_id") == False)

train_data_new.registerTempTable('mercari_t')

%spark2.pyspark
hive_context.sql(
    "select category_name,count(*) as totl from mercari_t group by category_name order by totl desc").show()

paragraphs.text:
%spark2.sql
select item_condition_id, count(*) test
from mercari_t
group by item_condition_id

%spark2.sql
select * from (select category_name,count(*) as totl 
from mercari_t 
group by category_name 
order by totl desc)
where category_name = ''

%spark2.sql
--if(category_name is null,1,0)
select name,item_condition_id,category_name,brand_name,price,shipping,item_description 
from mercari_t 
where category_name = ''
and lower(name) like '%books%'
